name: Speedy Chicken
description:
Speedy Chicken.

Welcome to your first day as a delivery driver for Speedy Chicken!

It's a steady job. Use your GPS to race to the next delivery spot. Hand over one of our famous "Speedy Buttered Chicken" dishes. Accept a cursed tip. And head on to the next.

How To Play
  • Use the arrows [up/down/left/right] to speed your bike in that direction.
  • Head towards the pink "give-me-butter-chicken" delivery target!
  • You can use the GPS arrow (bottom-right) to see where the next delivery spot is.
  • Drive over the target to deliver some chicken and score a point
  • Every successful delivery will result in you being 'cursed' with a tip!
  • Each of the tip effects (see below) apply for a short period of time.
  • For every tip you have in effect a score multiplier of x2 applies (see top-right for score and multiplier)
  • You have until your stereo battery runs out (1 minute and 45 seconds; see top-centre) to score as much as possible.
  • Share you score in the comments!
The Tips
  • >>NITRO>> - Go at twice the speed!
  • ?sdrawkcab - Controls are reversed!
  • <= FIRE. - Shoot blocks of fire out the back of your bike!
  • #dark# - Darkness clouds your view.
  • @badgps - Your GPS points exactly in the wrong direction.
  • ...tiny... - Delivery zones are tiny.
  • 8~SPIN~8 - The world spins constantly!
  • {booooing} - Cars and trees now send you flying if you hit them.
Attributions

This game wouldn't be anywhere near as good without these great people sharing their work:

  • "8bit" by athenswill2 is licensed under CC BY-SA 2.0
  • "Ding Dong" by MatthewWong is in the Public Domain, CC0
  • "Engine » ENGINE.WAV" by MarlonHJ is in the Public Domain, CC0
